About.HotelDescription: Centrally located in the city, The Langham, New York, Fifth Avenue is a convenient base for all your big city adventures. Iconic cultural attractions and shopping destinations, like The Grand Central Station and Times Square, are just a short walk away.

Reviews.HotelReview: We have just had 5 nights in Barcelona and stayed at hotel market for one night. First impressions were great, entrance is impressive with the boutique style and lovely restaurant and then we went to our room....this is where is was all a bit random, there was a pillar right in front of the door which was weird, a massive picture at the end of the bed which was freaky and beds so hard it was like sleeping on wood. We tried to have a nap when we arrived but there was drilling etc going on somewhere in the hotel. Shower is also mixer so you have to spend ages getting the right temperature. Would I stay there again? Probably not, however it was cheap and actually nothing really bad but just a little random. Staff I must say were great, extremely friendly and helpful :)

We had an excellent stay at this hotel during the Catalan Day weekend. Location is great, service outstanding. The pool and bar at the top floor were great and the service was outstanding and vert friendly. Will certainly go back next time
